overview: A global Korn event taking, the night before the release of their new album, Requiem. Join the band in honoring the souls that have passed during these unprecedented times, with an intimate ceremony and epic live performance, music directed by Richard Gibbs (Queen of the Damned), unlike youâ€™ve ever seen Korn before, at the Hollywood United Methodist Church in Los Angeles!
title: Korn: Requiem Mass
